title: ETHDubai
description: The Ethereum dev conference in Dubai on everything DeFi, NFTs, EVM scaling, Gaming and more with a focus on decentralization and community projects.

title: ZK Hack
description: ZK Hack is a 7-week virtual event featuring weekly workshops and advanced puzzle solving competitions.

title: ETHDenver
description: ETHDenver is a member-owned Community Innovation Festival. With the genesis of SporkDAO in June of 2021, ETHDenver is the first event based DAO in the world.

title: Schelling Point
description: A one-day celebration of mechanism design, coordination tech, public goods, and regen finance.

title: ETHAmsterdam
description: Strap in for three days of hacking, summits, and side events celebrating the energy in the ecosystem and setting an optimistic tone for the rest of the year.

title: HackMoney
description: Our DeFi focused online hackathon will continue for the 3rd year.

title: ETHNewYork
description: Leveraging the excitement and support of the New York web3 community, we’re proud to announce that we’ll be back for more this June.

title: HackFS
description: We’ll be continuing HackFS for the 3rd year in a row in partnership with Protocol Labs.

title: ETHMexicoCity
description: Located in the heart of the nation’s crypto scene, come prepared for a strong showing from the Mexican crypto diaspora—and a good time.

title: ETHOnline
description: Our biggest online event will happen again next September.

title: ETHSanFrancisco
description: The energy and excitement at the first ETHSanFrancisco will be hard to top, but we have our eyes set on delivering an even more impactful experience.

title: ETHTaipei
description: We’ve been working behind the scenes with the crypto community on the ground and are excited to share the details soon, so clear your calendar for an incredible weekend.

title: ETHBogota
description: Whenever Devcon happens, we’ll be running ETHBogota right alongside it. Don’t miss the biggest web3 developer meetup of the year.
